languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} (BS) reflects a character's accuracy with all forms of {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapons and determines the trajectory of shots in a burst. A high Ballistics Skill indicates that a character is a skilled marksman, someone to be feared in a gunfight or skirmish. The base {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} for ranged attacks within a weapon's effective range is <u>(30 + BS)</u>%.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальний Бой{/g} (ДБ) характеризует точность персонажа при использовании дистанционного оружия и влияет на траектории выстрелов в очереди. При высоком значении этой характеристики персонаж представляет собой грозную силу в любой перестрелке. Базовый {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}шанс попадания{/g} при дистанционных атаках на {g|Encyclopedia:Range}эффективной дальности{/g} составляет <u>(30 + ДБ)</u>%.

traits.locale_text: Ballistic Skill reflects the character's accuracy with all forms of ranged weapons. A high Ballistics Skill indicates that the character is an excellent shooter to be feared in a gunfight or skirmish. The base hit chance for ranged attacks within effective range is <u>30 + Ballistic Skill</u>.

{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} (BS) reflects a character's accuracy with all forms of {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapons and determines the trajectory of shots in a burst. A high Ballistics {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skill{/g} indicates that a character is a skilled marksman, someone to be feared in a gunfight or skirmish. The base {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} for ranged attacks within a weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effective{/g} range is <u>(30 + BS)</u>%.

The base {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} for ranged attacks within a weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effective{/g} range is <u>(30 + BS)</u>%.

{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} (BS) reflects a character's accuracy with all forms of ranged weapons. A high Ballistics Skill indicates that a character is a deadeye, someone to be feared in a gunfight or skirmish. The base {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} for ranged attacks within a weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:Range}effective range{/g} is <u>(30 + BS)</u>%.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}代表角色使用各种{g|Encyclopedia:Range}远程{/g}武器的命中率，也会决定连发射击时的弹道偏移程度。弹道技能越高，角色的射击就越是精准，在枪战与遭遇战中就会越是令人望而生畏。在武器的有效射程内时，远程攻击的基本{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中率{/g}为<u>（30+弹道技能）</u>%。
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} (BS) reflects a character's accuracy with all forms of {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapons and determines the trajectory of shots in a burst. A high Ballistics Skill indicates that a character is a skilled marksman, someone to be feared in a gunfight or skirmish. The base {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} for ranged attacks within a weapon's effective range is <u>(30 + BS)</u>%.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}代表角色使用各种{g|Encyclopedia:Range}远程{/g}武器的命中率，也会决定连发射击时的弹道偏移程度。弹道{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}技能{/g}越高，角色的射击就越是精准，在枪战与遭遇战中就会越是令人望而生畏。在武器的{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}有效{/g}射程内时，远程攻击的基本{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中率{/g}为<u>（30+弹道技能）</u>%。

languages.text: La {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g} (HP) refleja la precisión de un personaje con toda clase de armas {g|Encyclopedia:Range}a distancia{/g} y determina la trayectoria de los proyectiles en una ráfaga. Una gran Habilidad de proyectiles indica que el personaje es un tirador certero, temible en un tiroteo o una escaramuza. La {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}probabilidad de impactar{/g} con ataques a distancia en el alcance efectivo de un arma es del <u>(30 + HP)</u> %.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} (BS) reflects a character's accuracy with all forms of {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapons and determines the trajectory of shots in a burst. A high Ballistics Skill indicates that a character is a skilled marksman, someone to be feared in a gunfight or skirmish. The base {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} for ranged attacks within a weapon's effective range is <u>(30 + BS)</u>%.

traits.locale_text: La {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g} (HP) refleja la precisión de un personaje con toda clase de armas {g|Encyclopedia:Range}a distancia{/g} y determina la trayectoria de los proyectiles en una ráfaga. Una gran {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Habilidad{/g} de proyectiles indica que el personaje es un tirador certero, temible en un tiroteo o una escaramuza. La {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}probabilidad de impactar{/g} con ataques a distancia en el alcance {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}efectivo{/g} de un arma es del <u>(30 + HP)</u> %.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}BS{/g}（BS）はキャラクターがあらゆる{g|Encyclopedia:Range}遠隔{/g}武器を使用する際の命中率を示し、連射の軌道を左右する。BSが高いほどそのキャラクターは熟練のマークスマンとなり、銃撃戦や小規模な戦闘で活躍する。武器の有効射程内における遠隔攻撃の基本{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中率{/g}は、<u>(30 + BS)</u>%に相当する。
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} (BS) reflects a character's accuracy with all forms of {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapons and determines the trajectory of shots in a burst. A high Ballistics Skill indicates that a character is a skilled marksman, someone to be feared in a gunfight or skirmish. The base {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} for ranged attacks within a weapon's effective range is <u>(30 + BS)</u>%.

При высоком значении этой характеристики персонаж представляет собой грозную силу в любой перестрелке. Базовый {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}шанс попадания{/g} при дистанционных атаках на {g|Encyclopedia:Range}эффективной дальности{/g} составляет <u>(30 + ДБ)</u>%.

A high Ballistics {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skill{/g} indicates that a character is a deadeye, someone to be feared in a gunfight or skirmish. traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальний Бой{/g} (ДБ) характеризует точность персонажа при использовании {g|Encyclopedia:Range}дистанционного{/g} оружия. При высоком значении этой характеристики персонаж представляет собой грозную силу в любой перестрелке. Базовый {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}шанс попадания{/g} при дистанционных атаках на эффективной дальности составляет <u>30 + Дальний Бой</u>%.

{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальний Бой{/g} (ДБ) характеризует точность персонажа при использовании {g|Encyclopedia:Range}дистанционного{/g} оружия. При высоком значении этой характеристики персонаж представляет собой грозную силу в любой перестрелке. Базовый {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}шанс попадания{/g} при дистанционных атаках на эффективной дальности составляет <u>30 + Дальний Бой</u>%.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fähigkeit{/g} (BF) steht für die Präzision eines Charakters mit allen Arten von {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Fernkampfwaffen{/g} und bestimmt die Flugbahn der Schüsse einer Salve. Ein Charakter mit hoher Ballistik-Fertigkeit ist ein versierter Scharfschütze, vor dem man sich in Schießereien oder Scharmützeln in Acht nehmen sollte. Die Basis-{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Trefferchance{/g} für Fernkampfwaffen innerhalb der effektiven Reichweite einer Waffe ist <u>(30 + BF)</u> %.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} (BS) reflects a character's accuracy with all forms of {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapons and determines the trajectory of shots in a burst. A high Ballistics Skill indicates that a character is a skilled marksman, someone to be feared in a gunfight or skirmish. The base {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} for ranged attacks within a weapon's effective range is <u>(30 + BS)</u>%.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fähigkeit{/g} (BF) steht für die Präzision eines Charakters mit allen Arten von {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Fernkampf{/g}waffen und bestimmt die Flugbahn der Schüsse einer Salve. Ein Charakter mit hoher Ballistik-{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Fertigkeit{/g} ist ein versierter Scharfschütze, vor dem man sich in Schießereien oder Scharmützeln in Acht nehmen sollte. Die Basis-{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Trefferchance{/g} für Fernkampfwaffen innerhalb der {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effektiven{/g} Reichweite einer Waffe ist <u>(30 + BF)</u> %.

languages.text: La {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Capacité de tir{/g} (CT) reflète la précision avec laquelle un personnage manie les différentes formes d'armes à {g|Encyclopedia:Range}distance{/g} et détermine la trajectoire des tirs en rafale. Une compétence élevée indique que le personnage est un tireur d'élite, quelqu'un à craindre lors d'une fusillade ou d'une escarmouche. Les {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}chances de base de toucher{/g} lors d'attaques à distance à portée efficace d'une arme sont de <u>(30 + CT)</u> %.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} (BS) reflects a character's accuracy with all forms of {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapons and determines the trajectory of shots in a burst. A high Ballistics Skill indicates that a character is a skilled marksman, someone to be feared in a gunfight or skirmish. The base {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} for ranged attacks within a weapon's effective range is <u>(30 + BS)</u>%.

traits.locale_text: La {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Capacité de tir{/g} (CT) reflète la précision avec laquelle un personnage manie les différentes formes d'armes à {g|Encyclopedia:Range}distance{/g} et détermine la trajectoire des tirs en rafale. Une {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}compétence{/g} élevée indique que le personnage est un tireur d'élite, quelqu'un à craindre lors d'une fusillade ou d'une escarmouche. Les {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}chances de base de toucher{/g} lors d'attaques à distance à portée {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}efficace{/g} d'une arme sont de <u>(30 + CT)</u> %.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} (BS) reflects a character's accuracy with all forms of {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapons as well as trajectory of burst shots with them. A high Ballistics {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skill{/g} indicates that a character is a deadeye, someone to be feared in a gunfight or skirmish. The base {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} for ranged attacks within a weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effective{/g} range is <u>(30 + BS)</u>%.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} (BS) reflects a character's accuracy with all forms of {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapons as well as trajectory of burst shots with them. A high Ballistics {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skill{/g} indicates that a character is a deadeye, someone to be feared in a gunfight or skirmish. The base {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} for ranged attacks within a weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effective{/g} range is <u>(30 + BS)</u>%.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Balistik Yetenek{/g} (BAY), bir karakterin her türlü {g|Encyclopedia:Range}menzilli{/g} silahtaki isabetliliğini yansıtır ve seri saldırılarda atışların mermi yolunu belirler. Yüksek Balistik Yetenek, karakterin attığını vuran ve menzilli çatışmalarda korkulması gereken biri olduğunu gösterir. Bir silahın etkili menzil içinde yapılan menzilli saldırı için taban {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vuruş olasılığı{/g}, %<u>(30 + BAY)</u> formülüne eşittir.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Balistik Yetenek{/g} (BAY), bir karakterin her türlü {g|Encyclopedia:Range}menzilli{/g} silahtaki isabetliliğini yansıtır ve seri saldırılarda atışların mermi yolunu belirler. Bir silahın {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}etkili{/g} menzil içinde yapılan menzilli saldırı için taban {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vuruş olasılığı{/g}, %<u>(30 + BAY)</u> formülüne eşittir.
